Chọn ngôn ngữ

About IUH

Industrial University of Ho Chi Minh City

The Industrial University of Ho Chi Minh City (IUH) is a prestigious public university located in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam. Established in 1974, IUH has become one of the leading institutions for technical and industrial education in the country.

Key Information

  • Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
  • Founded: 1974
  • Type: Public University
  • Website: iuh.edu.vn

Academic Programs

  • Engineering and Technology
  • Business Administration
  • Information Technology
  • Fashion Design
  • Foreign Languages
  • And many more...

Mission

To provide high-quality education and training, conduct research, and transfer technology to serve the industrialization and modernization of Vietnam.
